body:
An advisor from the [Children and Family Court Advisory and Support Service (Cafcass)]({app:urls:url:cafcass}) or [CAFCASS Cymru]({app:urls:url:cafcass-cymru}) needs to know if you have other children so they can complete their background checks.

The advisor will contact the police and local authorities to see if they have any information about your other children. For example they need to know if theyâ€™ve been a victim of child abuse while in your care.

!abbr:cafcass!
heading: Why do we need to ask this?
